body:
```
Performance differences noted:
Benchmark                                                                 cpu_time    real_time
----------------------------------------------------------------------  ----------  -----------
BM_ErrorCreateAndSetIntAndStr                                               +33.50       +33.50
BM_ErrorGetStatus<ErrorWithHttpError>                                        -7.50        -7.50
BM_ErrorGetStatus<SimpleError>                                               +6.50        +6.50

BM_HpackEncoderEncodeHeader<SingleInternedBinaryElem<1, false>>/0/16k       +13.50       +13.50
BM_HpackEncoderEncodeHeader<SingleInternedBinaryElem<10, false>>/0/16k      +15.50       +15.50
BM_HpackEncoderEncodeHeader<SingleInternedBinaryElem<3, false>>/0/16k       +15.50       +15.50
BM_IsolatedFilter<ClientDeadlineFilter, SendEmptyMetadata>                  -11.00       -11.00

BM_SingleThreadPollOneFd                                                   +115.50      +115.50
BM_TransportStreamRecv/32k                                                 +184.50      +184.50
BM_TransportStreamRecv/4k                                                   +90.50       +90.50
```

The Linux failure is #11008. The Mac failures are #9727, #9935, #9979, and similar, plus #9151. The Windows failure is #9088. The interop failure is #10686.
